tip.ftbai.version: Did you know this pack was developed on Minecraft 1.18.2. Starting a 1.19 Server will always crash
tip.ftbai.goblins: There are 4 Goblin Shops that can be found around the school!
tip.ftbai.dialogue: Some quests do not have visible text until they're completed! Make sure to check them after you've done the task!
tip.ftbai.university: Many chapters were loaned from FTB University 1.19! Give it a try next!
item.ftbai.codex_botania.desc: A love story to be better than ...
item.ftbai.codex_occultism.desc: Master of the Occult and Worldshaping
item.ftbai.codex_evilcraft.desc: University of Evil, a tale of a genius
item.ftbai.codex_goblin.desc: Traders of Heart, Mischief And Gold.
